Backend extension¶

Created on 2019. 5. 23.

@author: Inwoo Chung (gutomitai@gmail.com)

tensorflow_backend.multivariate_normal_diag(loc=None, scale_diag=None, scale_identity_multiplier=None, validate_args=False, allow_nan_stats=True, name='MultivariateNormalDiag')¶

Multivariate normal distribution with a diagonal covariance matrix.
